Data: Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run 147kph, full on off, hint of away swing, he drives with a push towards cover

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run 137kph, good length, fifth stump line, he defends from the crease on the front foot to point

Cummins to Rohit Sharma, OUT caught at third man! He fell for the trap! It was short and wide, he freed the hands to slap a cut shot up and over backward point, there was extra bounce, he got a top edge that flew all the way to third man and Zampa took the catch well, infront off
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, 1 wide full and swinging well down the leg side and rightly called wide
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, FOUR runs 139kph, half-volley on leg stump and he pings this away off his pads with ease! Lovely stroke. Right in Dhawan's zone. He loves these
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run 140kph, full angled across him, he frees the arms and smokes a drive straight to the man at cover
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run 140kph, good length, top of off, he defends with a dead bat on the front foot
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run good length, angled across the left-hander and he raises the bat to let it go
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run 138kph, off cutter, good length, he plays from the crease pushing this towards point
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, 2 runs 140kph, full and shaping into the pads again and he eases this through the gap at wide mid on, nicely timed, didn't over hit it to pick up a couple
Cummins to Kohli, no run short and wide, seaming further away, Kohli isn't tempted to cut this, he watches it go by
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run 141kph, he slices a drive off the outside half of the bat in the air for a short way but well wide of gully down to the wide third man
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run 137kph, good length, it just holds in the surface a touch, he checks his drive pushing it back to the bowler
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run 140kph, good length, off stump, he defends with the full face pushing to cover
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run shorter effort ball, he's jumping back and across to knock this down cautiously

Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run 138kph, full and wide of off, hint of shapes, he gets a lovely stride in and drives in textbook fashion but straight to cover

Coulter-Nile to Kohli, FOUR runs glorious straight drive down the ground! Coulter-Nile over pitches, he just leans forward and punches this back past the stumps, straight of mid on. Supreme from King Kohli
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run full length again, he pushes forward and caresses it towards mid off, doesn't time this anywhere near as well

Coulter-Nile to Kohli, FOUR runs too straight and clipped through midwicket! Again he over pitched, angled in to off, he just uses the bottom hand to turn this through the gaping gap at midwicket and he timed it to perfection.
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run good length, fifth stump line, he's forward and defending with the head over the ball
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run full length, he just checks this stroke, turning the bottom hand to angle it to mid on
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run full length, he leans forward and pushes nicely but straight to cover

Cummins to S Dhawan, FOUR runs Cracking pull shot over square midwicket! It was banged in and he picked the length in a flash and smashed it flat through square midwicket! Shikhar is so quick on those.
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run very full outside off, he drives but gets it off the toe of the bat and it rolls slowly to cover

Cummins to S Dhawan, FOUR runs Superb back foot square drive! It was only fractionally short and wide, he got up on the toes, played with the vertical bat and placed it through backward point with outstanding timing.
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run good length, angled across him and he's happy to let this go through to the keeper
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run good length, fifth stump line, he defends on the front foot to point
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run fuller length, fifth stump line, he pushes with the full face to mid off
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run pushes a drive away from his body, slicing in the air well wide of gully to third man
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, FOUR runs flicked fine of fine leg! Bad ball this. Drifting down leg, fine leg is wide, he just helped it on it's way flicking it fine and it raced away.
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run good length, fourth stump line, he is forced to defend

Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run darted into off, not much turn, he's back and tapping this to the gap at point with the sweeper back in the deep
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run flatter into leg stump, he is back and working to square leg, some slight hesitation but an easy one
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run round arm, sliding in towards off, he's back and defending, Maxwell appealed for pad first but it looked all bat
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run fuller on off, he's forward and defending
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run sliding on with the arm into the pad, but it's going down leg and they bail out of the appeal
Zampa to Kohli, 2 runs short drag down and he's back and pulling with control straight of deep midwicket and they get an easy two
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run full toss, he just pushes a drive to long off
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run shorter length, he's back and punching with the turn to deep midwicket
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run drifting to leg stump, he's back and clipping this neatly to deep midwicket
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run looped up on leg, he whips this firmly but straight to midwicket
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run tossed up outside leg, he watchfully tucks this around the corner to the man in the deep behind square
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run full outside off, he drives firmly straight to cover
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run round arm, flatter, sliding on, he's back and punching to cover-point

Maxwell to S Dhawan, OUT huge LBW appeal, given not out. The Australians think this is plumb. They review. Dhawan went back to a shorter ball but it slid on quickly off the pitch, he tried to pull and played straight over it. He was hit flush on the pad infront of leg. Ball track

Cummins to Rayudu, no run good length fifth stump line, he defends on the front foot
Cummins to Rayudu, no run back of a length, fifth stump line, he is squared up on the crease defending into the off side
Cummins to Rayudu, no run 140kph, good length, top of off, he is squared up and defending back to the bowler
Cummins to Rayudu, no run beaten pushing away from his body at a 137kph, good length ball wide of off. A touch of extra bounce
Cummins to Rayudu, no run 143kph, back of a length, he's caught on the crease, he gets a thick inside edge onto pad
Cummins to Rayudu, no run he charges down the track to a 135kph, length ball and tries to hit it out of Nagpur and gets a thick inside edge onto pad
Maxwell to Kohli, no run
Maxwell to Kohli, no run darted into leg, full, he defends
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run looped up on leg, he whips this firmly off the front foot to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Rayudu, 1 run slower on leg, he's back and working to square leg, Handscomb dives and knocks it down but can't prevent the single
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run fuller on leg, he's forward and working this neatly to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Rayudu, 1 run shorter and slower, he's back and punching this to wide long on
Cummins to Rayudu, no run 144kph, fuller outside off, he pushes a drive to mid off
Cummins to Rayudu, no run 126kph, slower ball cutter outside off, he pushes on the front foot with an open face to gully
Cummins to Rayudu, no run 134kph, back of a length wide of off, he punches off the back foot but mistimes it due to the slow surface to point

Cummins to Rayudu, no run 143kph, fuller length, fourth stump, he drives firmly back to the bowler
Cummins to Rayudu, 1 run 123kph, slower ball wide of off, he opens the face and delicately runs this to fine third man for a single
Cummins to Kohli, 2 runs 140kph, shorter length, he steps out and turns the wrists placing this to the gap at midwicket and immediately calls two, brilliant placement and running
Maxwell to Rayudu, 1 run flatter and shorter, he's back and tucking this to the circle at wide mid on and Maxwell sprints after it to ensure they don't look for two
Maxwell to Kohli, no run tossed up on off, he skips down and defends, well bowled
Maxwell to Kohli, no run slower on leg, length ball, he clips this straight to forward square
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run looped up on leg, slower, he pushes on the front foot to long on
Maxwell to Rayudu, 2 runs tossed up outside off, he drives nicely past cover, wide of long off for a couple
Maxwell to Rayudu, 1 run flatter, round arm into middle, he clips this with the minimal turn to deep midwicket
Zampa to Rayudu, no run quicker leg break, 91kph, he's back and defending infront of the stumps
Zampa to Rayudu, no run good length, he is back trying to pull, it skids on, he gets a bottom edge onto pad!
Zampa to Rayudu, no run shorter length, he's back giving room and punching to cover
Zampa to Rayudu, no run tossed up on off, he is forward and smothering the spin
Zampa to Rayudu, 1 run leg break looped up outside off, he strides out and drives firmly to deep cover-point

Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run shorter length but not that short, just outside off, he's back and pulling, mistiming it to deep square leg
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run leg break, tossed up, he steps forward and drives neatly to long off

Zampa to Rayudu, FOUR runs waist high full toss and he latches on smashing over midwicket! Just a loose delivery, but he didn't quite middle it to get six. But four nonetheless
Zampa to Rayudu, 1 leg bye fuller, drifting down leg, it just brushes the pad and rolls fine for a leg bye
Zampa to Kohli, no run good length leg break, he sits back and dabs it to backward point, he looks for one but it's not on and Rayudu sends him back

Lyon to Kohli, FOUR runs flatter and quicker wide of off, he sits back and plays a delightful late dab, opening the face running it fine for four! Brilliant. He wants to put Lyon under pressure
Lyon to Kohli, no run flatter and fuller length, he's back and forced to defend

Zampa to Kohli, 1 run tossed up outside off, big stride out to drive to sweeper cover

Lyon to Shankar, 1 run flighted ball on middle and leg, gets on the front foot and clips to the right of long-on
Lyon to Kohli, no run lovely flight on an off-stump line. Kohli stretches out but can't get close enough to the pitch of it to drive. Only manages a defensive push to extra-cover
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run the line is now more middle-stumpish and Kohli can bring his wrists into play to flick to the right of midwicket

Zampa to Shankar, 1 run he's struggling with his release today. Another full-toss, about three-fourths of a stump high. Punched to long-off

Zampa to Shankar, 1 run full on off stump, clipped away to deep midwicket
Coulter-Nile to Shankar, FOUR runs shot. It's a touch short, and quite a bit of width on it. Vijay punches it crisply, with a straight bat, to the point boundary

Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run full, angling into middle stump. Kohli gets across and flicks it to fine leg
Coulter-Nile to Shankar, no run back of a length, a bit of nip back in towards off stump. Cramps Vijay as he looks to dab into the point region, and he inside edges into his thigh pad
Coulter-Nile to Shankar, no run back of a length, a little wider outside off. Presses forward and defends to backward point

Coulter-Nile to Shankar, no run back of a length just outside off. Vijay takes a step back and across to try and flick it to the right of midwicket, but he doesn't get close enough to the line to be able to find the gap. Hits it to the fielder instead
Lyon to Kohli, no run flat trajectory, angling across to off stump. Goes back and across and clips to midwicket
Lyon to Kohli, no run nicely bowled, drifts it across to off stump and Kohli stretches out, looking to defend, playing for turn. Slides on with the angle to beat the outside edge
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run a bit more flight and Kohli can take a big step forward to whip it firmly to long-on
Lyon to Shankar, no run flat length ball slanting across the batsman. Good stride forward to defend

Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on and guides it to third man

Coulter-Nile to Shankar, 1 run nice length, on the fuller side of a good length without being full enough to play the full-blooded drive. Gets forward to try and drive past extra-cover but the fielder dives to his right to parry the ball away
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run shortish on off stump, gets on his toes to ride the bounce and punch into the point region
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run length ball, angling into middle and leg. Tucked away quietly to long leg
Coulter-Nile to Shankar, no run fullish, close to off stump, looks like the offcutter. Shows the full face to punch it back to the bowler
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run quickish on the pads. Tickled away into the fine fine leg region

Lyon to Shankar, FOUR runs flat again, a touch shorter on leg stump, and that's cleverly done. Steps across his stumps to create the opportunity to glance it really fine, and he leaves long leg no chance
Lyon to Shankar, 1 run flat length ball on leg stump, clipped to deep midwicket
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run back of a length, straightens slightly onto an off-stump line. Goes deep in his crease and punches to long-on
Lyon to Shankar, no run nicely flighted close to off stump, good stretch out to get close to the pitch and defend
Lyon to Shankar, 1 run length ball on off stump, gets forward and clips to the right of midwicket

Coulter-Nile to Shankar, FOUR runs overpitched, angling into off stump, and that's a super shot from Vijay. Gets forward and brings his bottom hand into play to drive it between the non-striker and mid-on
Coulter-Nile to Shankar, 1 run short, fifth-stump line, lets it come on and steers it to third man
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run fullish, close to off stump, strides forward and pushes to deep point to bring up his 50th fifty in ODIs. Wow.
Coulter-Nile to Shankar, 1 leg bye back of a length, angling slightly down leg, tucked off the hip towards long leg. Not sure he got any bat on it, actually
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run back of a length close to off stump, lets it come on and chops it to third man
Coulter-Nile to Shankar, 1 run fullish, angling into off stump, nice use of the wrists again to clip into the gap to the right of mid-on, forces the fielder into a sprint and a dive
Lyon to Shankar, no run nice trajectory, dips onto a good length close to off stump, all the while angling across Vijay. Gets on the front foot to defend with soft hands
Lyon to Shankar, 1 run back of a length on leg stump, tucked away to long leg
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run back of a length on off stump, goes back and across for the straight-bat punch to deep square leg
Lyon to Shankar, no run flat, angled across onto a good length outside off. Stretches forward and across to defend
Lyon to Shankar, no run fuller now, on off stump, whipped to midwicket

Stoinis to Shankar, 1 run back of a length on off stump, pulled round whippily to deep square leg

Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run back of a length close to off stump, waits on it and steers it down to third man

Stoinis to Shankar, SIX runs and again, that almost-straight-bat punch over midwicket. This one was even shorter, and he can free his arms even more to clear the boundary

Lyon to Kohli, FOUR runs back of a length, close to off stump, and that's smartly done. Stays leg-side of the ball, waits, and uses the pace and round-the-wicket angle to guide it into the gap to the left of short third man
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run tossed up wide of off stump, and Kohli brings his wrists into play to whip it to long-on

Lyon to Shankar, no run on the pads, clipped firmly but straight to backward square leg
Lyon to Shankar, 1 run a little shorter, goes back and works it to deep square leg
Lyon to Kohli, no run tossed up on middle stump, gets forward for the flick to backward square leg

Zampa to Shankar, FOUR runs that's some greeting. Flights it and drops it into his hitting arc, on off stump, but he still had to do the bulk of the work there, nice stride forward, keeping his front leg out of the way, and drives it firm and crisp, back over the bowler's head
Zampa to Shankar, 1 run looks for another big hit, this time he isn't quite close enough to the pitch of the ball. Skews it briefly in the air, towards long-off
Zampa to Kohli, no run back of a length close to off stump, goes back to chop to short third man

Zampa to Kohli, no run flat length ball on off stump, Kohli stretches out to block into the covers
Lyon to Jadhav, 1 run back of a length, angling across to top of off. Goes deep in his crease to tuck it away through backward square leg
Lyon to Kohli, 1 run flat length ball on leg stump, clipped to the right of backward square leg
Lyon to Jadhav, no run tossed up slow outside off, presses forward, waits, and blocks it back to the bowler

Lyon to Kohli, no run flat length ball, bounces extra to hit Kohli on the glove as he leans back for the late cut
Lyon to Kohli, no run a touch short, Kohli pulls but can't beat the man at backward square leg

Zampa to Jadhav, 1 run full on off stump, punched to long-off, briefly in the air
Zampa to Kohli, no run loopy delivery just outside off. Another full-blooded straight drive from Kohli, back towards the bowler on this occasion

Zampa to Jadhav, 1 run length ball on leg stump, clipped away towards deep square leg

Lyon to Jadhav, no run flat length ball angling across to off stump, goes back to defend with soft hands
Lyon to Jadhav, no run back of a length on leg stump, clipped to backward square leg
Lyon to Jadhav, no run flat length ball on middle stump, clipped to midwicket

Lyon to Kohli, no run back of a length on off stump, hangs back and chops to short third man

Zampa to Dhoni, OUT and he's gone first ball! Perhaps not short enough to cut, or wide enough, and it hurries through off the pitch. Dhoni rocks back and only manages a thick edge that is gobbled up brilliantly at slip by Usman Khawaja falling to his right. He wouldn't have had
Zampa to Jadeja, no run shorter length leg break, he's back and tucking this behind square to the fielder

Lyon to Jadeja, no run tossed up outside off, he reaches forward and smothers the spin

Maxwell to Jadeja, 1 run loopy full toss, gently pushed down the ground to long on

Maxwell to Kohli, no run fuller on leg, he turns this straight to forward square leg in the circle
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run tossed up on middle, he drills this down to long on

Lyon to Jadeja, no run looped up outside off, he defends again reaching out
